label: social_support
src_text: Thanks for your suggestion, i really appreciate it.
augmented_text: Thank you for providing the assistance I needed, I'm so grateful.

label: social_support
src_text: Some kind soul here in our sub suggested Sailor Kin-Mokusei (thank you!
augmented_text: All my thanks go to the empathetic soul in our online community who introduced me to Sailor Kin-Mokusei - it's been such a help!

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you for taking the time to read and engage with my argument.
augmented_text: Your receptiveness to my argument has not gone unnoticed, thank you.

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you for being inquisitive and frank and I'm glad we are having this conversation.
augmented_text: Your genuine openness and willingness to explore is appreciated, and I'm glad to be discussing this with you.

label: social_support
src_text: I understand this is frustrating, but you need to be your own advocate here.
augmented_text: It can be overwhelming, but try your best to stick up for yourself during these trying times.

label: social_support
src_text: In speaking from my own experiences, you may need to start with loving your inner child.
augmented_text: It's important to remember that, like myself, you should also begin by loving and accepting your inner child.

label: social_support
src_text: In any case, the core of my advice was that you should acquire a solid background in mathematics.
augmented_text: Just a friendly reminder that mastering mathematics can open up countless opportunities for growth and success.

label: social_support
src_text: He was never top class but if you make it a decade anywhere I suppose you deserve it.
augmented_text: He might not have been the best, but spending ten years in a place definitely earns you recognition.

label: social_support
src_text: My heart breaks for you.. please know we're sending you both love and good vibes.
augmented_text: Sending you both comforting hugs and loving thoughts, we're always here for you. 🤗

label: social_support
src_text: You may have lost faith in yourself, but we never doubted you.
augmented_text: Don't give up on yourself, because we certainly haven't.

label: social_support
src_text: Some kind soul here in our sub suggested Sailor Kin-Mokusei (thank you!
augmented_text: Huge shoutout to the person who recommended Sailor Kin-Mokusei in the group chat! Much appreciated.

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you giving me a place to share my love for these wonderful souls.
augmented_text: I'm so grateful for this platform to spread my dedication and passion for these amazing individuals.

label: social_support
src_text: In any case, the core of my advice was that you should acquire a solid background in mathematics.
augmented_text: You'll thank yourself later for putting in the time and effort to strengthen your mathematical abilities.

label: social_support
src_text: You made me compile a series of photos of us as friends.
augmented_text: You motivated me to put together a slideshow of our fun times as friends, and I can't stop watching it!

label: social_support
src_text: While my questions were rhetorical thank you for the detailed answers.
augmented_text: My questions were only meant to be thought-provoking, but your careful explanations have been enlightening.
